attributes.action: ban heavy good vehicles from using motorways during peak traffic times.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Designate heavy goods vehicles to drive on the motorway outside of peak traffic times.  These slow vehicles overtake on to the middle and fast lane, thus causing unnecessary delays and congestion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
